attributes.action: FORCE MPS TO INTERACT AND VISIT MEMBERS OF CONSTITUENCY MORE.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have contacted several mps over the past few months.Not one of them had the decency to reply or even aknowledge my contact.I stay in a deprived area,and mps said they would visit on a certain day,they did,they just didnt come in to the bad area where i stay.I think Mps and our  should be made to contact people who contact them with genuine problems,and not ignore them.Mps and others i have mentioned, all have one thing in common,they are all elected members of parliament,the least they could do is contact the people who put them there.I did vote labour at the last two elections,but i wont this time.The only time Mps contact you is when they want your vote,perfect example,our MP hasnt been near my community since the last election-yeterday"surprise-surprise" he was outside our local supermarket pleading how much he cares for the comunity.i dont think so.The only time an Mp sees you is when they stop to see what they have trodden on.I wouldnt vote any of them in.
